title: Smallpox: merciless traveller
creator_credit: Czechoslovak Film Studios, World Health Organisation and Vaclav Bedrich
brief_description: This animated film deals with the history of smallpox throughout the ages. Shows how it has ravaged the world from the time of the Pharoahs, the discovery of a vaccine by Edward Jenner and his fight to have it recognised by international medical authorities and how the smallpox problem is being dealt with in the present day.
